name: Aural_Decoy
description: Lures enemies away by creating a sound originating in the distance.

name: Cast_Light
description: Cast a bright light upon surroundings, and lasts 5 minutes. Particularly useful for Tomb of Giants

name: Chameleon
description: Transform the caster into an inanimate object. Generally, the object you become is something common to the area you are in. Could be a vase, or a box, etc. Some strategy must be used, and the most effective is to place yourself in a cluster of similar objects. Once cast, you can move slowly and position yourself. If done properly, an enemy will walk by you and never know you're there. Cannot run when using, any other action breaks the effect.

name: Crystal_Magic_Weapon
description: Enhances and crystallizes right-hand weapon. Weapon must be standard, crystal, or raw. Some Dragon and Unique weapons can be enchanted too. Adds 1.4x your Magic Adjustment stat (NOT Intelligence) as magic damage to your weapon.

name: Crystal_Soul_Spear
description: Fire an even more powerful, piercing ranged attack.

name: Dark Bead
description: Fires a large amount of small dark orbs that fan outwardsâ€”very fast cast time. Excellent against large bosses.

name: Dark Fog
description: Creates a fog that inflicts poison. The fog is created at the location of the locked target.

name: Dark Orb
description: After a brief charge, fires a large shot at your target.

name: Fall_Control
description: Reduces damage and noise from fall. However, terminal falls will still kill you even with this active.

name: Great_Heavy_Soul_Arrow
description: Stronger than heavy soul arrow, fewer uses. Has a slow cast time, but deals a tremendous amount of damage, even against bosses.

name: Great_Magic_Weapon
description: Enhances the right-hand weapon. Weapon must be standard, crystal, or raw. Some Dragon and Unique weapons can be enchanted too. Adds 1.1x your Magic Adjustment stat (NOT Intelligence) magic damage to your weapon.

name: Great_Soul_Arrow
description: Stronger soul arrow, same cast time as soul arrow, fewer uses.

name: Heavy_Soul_Arrow
description: Stronger than greater soul arrow, longer casting time.

name: Hidden_Body
description: Masks your presence, making detection harder.

name: Hidden_Weapon
description: Turns your right hand weapon invisible. Weapon must be standard, crystal, or raw. Some Dragon and Unique weapons can be enchanted too.

name: Homing_Crystal_Soulmass
description: Fires multiple, homing crystal projectiles. Can be successfully cast without an initial lock-on. Multiple crystal arrows will hover above the player. Each individual soul arrow will seek the closest target, in the direction the player is facing, when in range.

name: Homing_Soulmass
description: Fires multiple, homing magic projectiles. Can be successfully cast without an initial lock-on. Multiple soul arrows will hover above the player. Each individual soul arrow will seek the closest target, in the direction the player is facing, when in range. Because the spell can be cast in advance, it has a unique advantage in that, if timed correctly, it can be cast in synchronicity with other attacks.

name: Hush
description: Masks all noises of caster.

name: Magic_Shield
description: Reinforces the equipped shield or weapon able to block in the left hand with magic. Works on all types of shields (even unique or upgraded to any path) and on all weapons able to block while on the left hand (even unique or upgraded to any path). Halves stamina used on hit deflection (only on shields) and improves the weapon's or shield's magic resistance by 30% (by up to a maximum of 90%). Lasts 15 seconds, 5 casts.

name: Magic_Weapon
description: Enhances the right-hand weapon.Weapon must be standard, crystal, or raw. Some Dragon and Unique weapons can be enchanted too. Adds 0.8x your Magic Adjustment stat (NOT Intelligence) magic damage to your weapon.

name: Pursuers
description: Slow moving dark soul mass, fires and homes in on target when in range. Slower moving than homing soul mass but has much better homing capabilities.

name: Remedy
description: Removes poison/toxic/bleeding build up, and cures poison/toxic status.

name: Repair
description: Repairs weapons and armor

name: Resist_Curse
description: Removes curse build up.

name: Soul_Arrow
description: Fires a magical projectile. Excellent starting spell which does very good damage against most enemies in the early game areas.

name: Soul_Spear
description: Fire piercing soul spear.

name: Strong_Magic_Shield
description: Reinforces the equipped shield or weapon able to block in the left hand with a stronger magic effect. Works on all types of shields (even unique or upgraded to any path) and on all weapons able to block while on the left hand (even unique or upgraded to any path). Reduces the stamina used to deflect a hit considerably (only on shields) and improves all the resistances of the shield or weapon enchanted to 100%. Lasts 15 seconds, 3 casts.

name: White_Dragon_Breath
description: A straight line of crystals pop out of the ground in front of you, shooting towards your target. One advantage of this spell is that it will take out large groups of enemies if they are lined up one behind the other. It has a medium cast time, but once it fires, it will take out anything in its path. 20 casts make this a great high level replacement for the soul arrow at high levels, as it's not as useful on most bosses.

name: Acid_Surge
description: Pyromancy foreign to the Great Swamp. Emit acid which corrodes weapons and armor damaging their durability. Does not affect user.

name: Black Flame
description: Similar to Great Combustion. Melee-range pyromancy. Main difference with Great Combustion is that when Black Flame is blocked, it consumes a much higher amount of stamina than Great Combustion, making this pyromancy great for breaking guards.

name: Chaos_Fire_Whip
description: Sweep foes with chaos fire whip with lava traces Note: Leaves lava behind for a bit. Follows same mechanics as Fire Whip.

name: Chaos_Storm
description: Erect localized chaos fire pillars which leave blobs of temporary lava Note: Like firestorm and leaves a little lava behind.

name: Combustion
description: Elementary pyromancy. Create powerful flame in hand Note: Good 'melee' range spell, very quick too.

name: Fireball
description: Standard pyromancy of the Great Swamp. Hurl fireball.

name: Firestorm
description: Primal pyromancy taught by Quelana of Izalith. Erect fire pillars in vicinity. Note: Uses 17 uses per cast.

name: Fire_Orb
description: Pyromancy which improves upon Fireball. Hurl fire orb.

name: Fire_Surge
description: Pyromancy foreign to the Great Swamp. Create a surge of flame from palm of hand. Note: Rapid fire spell you can cast while moving.

name: Fire_Tempest
description: Primal pyromancy of Quelana of Izalith. Erect giant fire pillars in vicinity.

name: Fire_Whip
description: Primal pyromancy taught by Quelana of Izalith. Sweep foes with fire whip. Note: Uses 21 uses per cast. Note:Hits twice/cast

name: Flash_Sweat
description: Covers the player in water, reduces fire damage.

name: Great_Chaos_Fireball
description: Hurl giant chaos fireball, leaving a large amount of temporary lava

name: Great_Combustion
description: Pyromancy which improves upon Combustion. Create powerful, giant flame in hand. Note: Very good melee range spell.

name: Great_Fireball
description: Ultimate fireball pyromancy. Hurl giant fireball.

name: Iron_Flesh
description: Self-buff, raises defenses and poise. Note: User becomes heavy and unable to move freely: can only walk, can't run, sprint, roll, or jump.

name: Poison_Mist
description: Breathes out a cone of poison mist that fills the surrounding area causing poison status.

name: Power_Within
description: Increases Attack and Defense but gradually drains HP

name: Toxic_Mist
description: Breathes out a cone of toxic mist that fills the surrounding area causing toxic status.

name: Undead_Rapport
description: Advanced pyromancy of Quelana of Izalith. Charm undead and gain temporary allies. Melee ranged support spell with about 2 second cast time.

name: Bountiful_Sunlight
description: Gradually restores HP over time for a short duration to you and nearby allies. Must be part of the Princess's Guard to use.

name: Darkmoon_Blade
description: Boosts right hand weapon with rays of Darkmoon. Adds 1.8x your talisman's Magic Adjustment value as Magic Damage at Covenant Rank 0. Scaling increases by 0.1x for each rank to a maximum of 2.1x at Covenant Rank 3. Must be member of Darkmoon covenant to use.

name: Emit_Force
description: Shoots a large ball of force energy to explode on the target causing damage to the target and close surrounding enemies. Can deflect sorceries.

name: Force
description: AoE effect that does no damage but knocks back most surrounding enemies Must be very close to cause knockdown. Can deflect sorceries such as Homing Soulmass.

name: Gravelord_Greatsword_Dance
description: AoE miracle similar to Gravelord Nito's scream sword attack. Several swords will pierce the ground impaling enemies in the area. Miracle is very effective when used in close quarters such as hallways or bridges as several swords may impale the same enemy.

name: Gravelord_Sword_Dance
description: Upgraded version of Gravelord Sword Dance miracle. Area of effect is expanded and increased damage.

name: Great_Heal
description: Heals a large amount of the casters HP, depending on faith.

name: Great_Heal_Excerpt
description: Cut down version of Great Heal. Heals large amount of HP to the caster. (NOTE: This spell does not affect allies as the erroneous load screen info would have you believe.)

name: Great_Lightning_Spear
description: A larger, more powerful spear of light that inflicts lightning damage. Scales with faith. Can be thrown into water to cause AoE. (Puddles, lakes,etc.)

name: Great_Magic_Barrier
description: As Magic Barrier but reduces even more magic damage. (90%)?

name: Heal
description: Heals a moderate amount of the casters HP, depending on faith.

name: Homeward
description: Transports you back to the last used bonfire.

name: Karmic_Justice
description: Karmic Justice is a self-buff that lasts for 1 minute. If the player takes successive hits in PHYSICAL damage (meaning melee and non-magical), the spell explodes, dealing massive damage to all nearby enemies and knocking them all down. A very effective miracle for players who wear cloth armor with no poise. If they get stunlocked by a combo, this spell can save you from certain death.

name: Lightning_Spear
description: A powerful spear of light that inflicts lightning damage. Scales with faith. Can be thrown into bodies of water to cause AoE. (Puddles, lakes,etc.)

name: Magic_Barrier
description: Reduces incoming magic damage for a short duration. (70%)?

name: Replenishment
description: Gradually restores HP over time for a short duration.

name: Seek_Guidance
description: The Seek Guidance miracle allows the player to see more messages on the ground as well as their positive and negative ratings. Additional developer messages, providing hints, can also be seen in some areas.

name: Soothing_Sunlight
description: Heals large amount of HP to the caster and nearby allies. Scales with faith. Must be part of the Princess's Guard to use.

name: Sunlight_Blade
description: Coats right hand weapon in lightning. Adds 1.8x your talisman's Magic Adjustment value as Lightning Damage.

name: Sunlight_Spear
description: A very powerful version of the lightning spear. Fewer charges but a lot more damage. Scales with faith. Can be thrown into water to cause AoE. (Puddles, lakes,etc.) Must remain part of Warriors of Sunlight to use.

name: Tranquil_Walk_of_Peace
description: Applies a debuff to nearby enemies which slows movement speed, that lasts for about 10 seconds.

name: Vow_of_Silence
description: An AoE silence around you that stops all casting in the area, including your own, for about 25 seconds. Does not scale with faith.

name: Wrath_of_the_Gods
description: A fast casting force spell that deals high damage in a bubble around you. One of the most powerful offensive miracles in the game. Can deflect sorceries.

name: Generic
description: A fast casting force spell that deals high damage in a bubble around you. One of the most powerful offensive miracles in the game. Can deflect sorceries.
